title: Practical 1: PCA
text:
Edit the code below and click “Run”.
#| '!! shinylive warning !!': |
#|   shinylive does not work in self-contained HTML documents.
#|   Please set `embed-resources: false` in your metadata.
#| standalone: true
#| viewerHeight: 600

library(shiny)
ui <- fluidPage(
  titlePanel("Interactive PCA"),
  plotOutput("pca_plot")
)
server <- function(input, output) {
  output$pca_plot <- renderPlot({ biplot(prcomp(mtcars)) })
}
shinyApp(ui, server)
